Buru na Angwe mejupụtara asụsụ nke Southern Bantoid nwere ike ịdị iche iche nke a na-asụ na Sardauna LGA, Taraba State nke Nigeria.
Buru bụ asụsụ obodo dị nso obodo a na-asụ Batu, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Baissa. Echebu na Angwe bụ Batu, asụsụ Tivoid, mana ọ bụ otu asụsụ ahụ dị ka Buru
E nwere ihe yiri Tivoid, ọ bụ ezie na ewezuga ịkekọrịta ụfọdụ okwu na Northwest Tivoid، ikekwe n'ihi kọntaktị, enwere obere ihe akaebe iji kewaa ya
Blench na-emeso ya dị ka ihe dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ime Bantoid (2016).
